title: System for Quality Assessment of Agricultural Product
abstract: A comprehensive system for automated quality assessment of agricultural products using computer vision and machine learning techniques.

title: A Method and System for Encoding and Decoding Data Using Markers
abstract: Novel approach for data encoding and decoding using visual markers for agricultural and industrial applications.

title: An Adjustable Apparatus for Uniform Image Acquisition
abstract: Innovative apparatus design for consistent and uniform image acquisition in computer vision applications.

title: Generic Classification Using Very Less Data
abstract: Advanced machine learning approach for accurate classification with minimal training data using novel data augmentation and transfer learning techniques.

title: Cattle Identification Using Face Recognition
abstract: Computer vision system for individual cattle identification using facial recognition technology for livestock management.
